ingredients.ingredient: 2 tablespoons seafood seasoning (such as Old Bay®), divided

cookingTips: Pat wings dry before seasoning for better coating adhesion
Use medium-high heat to prevent burning while cooking through
Baste with melted butter and seasoning mixture while grilling
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Grilled wings benefit from a savory coating that caramelizes over heat. Guide the cook on managing grill temperature to achieve crispy skin without charring.
